doc:
Frank Finlay https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Frank_Finlay 0 Francis Finlay, (6 August 1926 – 30 January 2016), known as Frank Finlay, was an English stage, film and television actor. He was Oscar-nominated for his supporting role in Olivier's 1965 film of Othello and got his first leading role on television in 1971 as Casanova, which led to appearances on The Morecambe and Wise Show. He also appeared in the controversial drama Bouquet of Barbed Wire. Francis_Finlay , ( 6_August_1926 – 30_January_2016 ) , known as Frank_Finlay , was an_English_stage , film_and_television_actor . He was_Oscar-nominated for his_supporting_role in Olivier 's_1965_film of Othello and got his_first_leading_role on television in 1971 as Casanova , which led to appearances on The_Morecambe_and_Wise_Show . He also appeared in the_controversial_drama_Bouquet of Barbed_Wire .
